title: WONDERFUL RANCH HOME WITH A FINISHED BASEMENT IN BOW MAR HEIGHTS!
posting_body: Wonderful ranch home with a finished basement in Bow Mar Heights!
5 bedroom 3 bath home nestled in a highly desirable neighborhood with mature trees on a large lot.
The home has been updated with stunning upgrades with designer touches.
Open floor plan with natural light spilling throughout the home.
Stunning contrast wall in the living room with gorgeous new LVT flooring.
You will simply love cooking in your new kitchen with all-new stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, and a tile backsplash.
The basement has a large open family room with so many options to make it your own along with 2 more bedrooms and a fully remodeled bathroom.
You're going to absolutely love the oversized backyard that feels like your own private sanctuary.
The home has brand new windows, a new furnace, new a/c along with a total remodel.
Wonderful home close to great schools, parks, trails, and restaurants.
